            <string language="hu">A szem működése közelre és távolra nézéskor</string>
            <string language="en">Functioning of the eye looking near and far</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arbeiten des Auges nahe und, das weit schaut</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fonctionnement de l'oeil regardant presque et 
loin</string>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzionamento dell'occhio che osserva vicino e

            <string language="x-mt-el">Λειτουργία του ματιού που φαίνεται κοντινού και 
μακρινού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Funcionamiento del ojo que mira cerca y lejos</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A szem alkalmazkodása közeli és távoli tárgyak nézésekor</string>
            <string language="en">Eye's accomodation to looking at subjects near and far</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">látás,  szem,  szemlencse,  </string>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Anpassung des Auges an Themen nahe und weit 
betrachten</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le logement de l'oeil à regarder des sujets 
presque et loin</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Acomodação do olho a olhar assuntos próximo e 
distante</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sistemazione dell'occhio a guardare gli oggetti 
vicino e lontano</string>
          </description>
          <description>

μακριά</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comodidad del ojo a mirar temas cerca y lejos</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vue, oeil, objectif cristallin d'oeil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vista, olho, lente cristalina do olho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vista, occhio, obiettivo cristallino dell'occhio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θέα, μάτι, κρυστάλλινος φακός του ματιού</string>

          <keyword>
